description:
In this Eighth Volume of 12 Volumes Lightwave Instructor Adam Gibson introduces the 3D student to Lightwave's Powerful Modeler. A great series for beginner 3D students.

Table of Contents for Modeler Volume #8

Chapter 1- Intro

Chapter 2- Multi Text Tool

Chapter 3- Mirror X Tool

Chapter 4- Mirror Y Tool

Chapter 5- Mirror Z Tool

Chapter 6- Mirror Tool (Part One)

Chapter 7- Mirror Tool (Part Two)

Chapter 8- Clone Tool

Chapter 9- Rail Clone Tool

Chapter 10- Array Tool

Chapter 11- Final

Running Time: 2 hrs. 0 mins.

Video Format: MP4 Video (.mp4)

Level: Beginner
title: Lightwave 11.5 Modeler Volume 8
